articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Instagram will soon let you reset your recommendation algorithm - TechCrunch
articles.description: Instagram is testing the ability for users to reset their recommendations, the company announced on Tuesday.
articles.content: Instagram is testing the ability for users to reset their recommendations, the company announced on Tuesday. By resetting your recommendations, you would be starting fresh and retraining the apps alg… [+2107 chars]
